title: Christmas Almond Cake
ingredients: ['225g butter, softened', '400g caster sugar', '6 eggs, room temperature', '225g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons almond extract', '225g marzipan', '120g icing sugar', '4 tablespoons milk', '70g blanched almonds', '4 drops red food colouring', '4 drops green food colouring']
